# Cape Fear Web Co.

> Wilmington, NC web design studio. Stunning, high-performance websites launched in under 7 days. Professional sites starting at just $249.

## Services
- UI/UX Design
- Custom Web Development (React, Next.js)
- Search Engine Optimization (Local SEO)
- Brand Identity Development
- Motion Design & Animation
- Rapid Prototyping

## Pricing
- Starter: $249 — Single-page website, mobile responsive, basic SEO
- Professional: $499 — Up to 5 pages, advanced animations, analytics
- Premium: $999+ — Unlimited pages, custom integrations, priority support
